content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: 
As the system, I received a command to browse a website with fun activities to do on the internet. I executed a command to get a text summary of the website, which included playing games, exploring digital content, learning new skills, listening to music and podcasts, and more. I also generated an image of digital art and wrote a list of fun activities to try to a file named "fun_activities.txt". Later, I executed a command to read the file and it returned the list of activities. As per the latest development, I received a command to use the 'google' command to search for more information about one of the fun activities, which was "how to play games online". I executed the command and received a file with the same list of fun activities again.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{
    "thoughts": {
        "text": "Let's use the 'google' command to search for more information about one of the fun activities we found on the website.",
        "reasoning": "Using the 'google' command will allow us to search for more information about one of the fun activities we found on the website, so we can learn more about it and potentially try it out.",
        "plan": "- Use the 'google' command to search for more information about one of the fun activities we found on the website",
        "criticism": "There is a chance that we may not find any useful information or may find information that is not relevant to the activity we are interested in, but we can always try again with a different search query.",
        "speak": "Let's use the 'google' command to search for more information about one of the fun activities we found on the website and learn more about it."
    },
    "command": {
        "name": "google",
        "args": {
            "query": "how to play games online",
        }
    }
}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command read_file returned: Fun activities to try on the internet:
- Playing games
- Exploring digital comics
- Listening to podcasts
- Creating music
- Discovering new websites
- Watching live animal cams
- Learning new languages'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "xdg-open https://www.pokemon.com/us/pokemon-games/"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:
b'\n\n  Your Terminal type is unknown!\n\n  Enter a terminal type: [vt100] \nTERMINAL TYPE IS SET TO y\n\n\n  Your Terminal type is unknown!\n\n  Enter a terminal type: [vt100] \nTERMINAL TYPE IS SET TO y\n'
STDERR:
b"Terminal initialisation failed - unknown terminal type?\n/usr/bin/xdg-open: 882: links2: not found\n/usr/bin/xdg-open: 882: elinks: not found\n/usr/bin/xdg-open: 882: links: not found\nTerminal initialisation failed - unknown terminal type?\n/usr/bin/xdg-open: 882: w3m: not found\nxdg-open: no method available for opening 'https://www.pokemon.com/us/pokemon-games/'\n"'}]
"""
